text: The 1926 Tempe State Bulldogs football team was an American football team that represented Tempe State Teachers College (later renamed Arizona State University) as an independent during the 1926 college football season. In their fourth season under head coach Aaron McCreary, the Bulldogs compiled a 4–1–1 record and outscored their opponents by a combined total of 97 to 42. The team's games included a 35–0 loss in the Arizona–Arizona State football rivalry. Ernest Simpkins was the team captain. ==References== Tempe State Category:Arizona State Sun Devils football seasons Category:1926 in Arizona
title: 1926 Tempe State Bulldogs football team
